special_text:
[+2]: Create a 1/1 black Horror creature token and a 1/1 red Parasite creature token with haste and “This creature can’t block”. You gain 2 life.
[-3]: Exile target nonland permanent. Its owner takes a burden.
[-8]: You get an emblem with “Whenever you cast a spell, you may choose a nonland card type. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen type. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.”
